mean_cn: n. 百叶窗；照相机快门
mean_en: one of a pair of wooden or metal covers that can be closed over the outside of a window to keep out light or protect the windows from damage
sentence: They opened the shutters to let in some light.
sentence_trans: 他们打开百叶窗让亮光透进来。
word_etyma: shutt=shut关闭 + er名词后缀 → shutter关闭装置
